sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { currencyFormat } from "helpers/currency"; const InvoiceInfo = ({ invoice }) => ( <>

Date of Issue

{invoice.issueDate}

Due Date

{invoice.dueDate}

Invoice Number

{invoice.invoiceNumber}

Reference

{invoice.reference}

Amount

{currencyFormat({ baseCurrency: invoice.company.currency, amount: invoice.amount })}

); export default InvoiceInfo;
